front.title: RFC 4871 DomainKeys Identified Mail (DKIM) Signatures -- Errata

abstract.t: This documents and resolves errata for RFC 4871, DomainKeys Identified Mail (DKIM) Signatures. Specifically the document clarifies the nature, roles and relationship of the two DKIM identifier tag values that are candidates for payload delivery to a receiving processing module. Errata Contact Fields Name: Dave Crocker Email: dcrocker@bbiw.net Type Technical
